{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Routers-rv130-vpn-router.png |image1_size = 150px |caption = Wireless Multifunction VPN Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/products/routers/rv130-vpn-router/index.html |sp = https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/support/routers/rv130-vpn-router/model.html |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Cisco |model = RV130W |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = N300 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = VPN Router, wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = N89-RV130W |icid = 5005A-RV130W |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 3763-20400102R |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Cavium;CNS3410; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = 11MPCore |cpu1spd = 600 <!-- 300 / 500 / 700 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = NOR |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX29GL256FHT2I-90Q; |flash1size = 32 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR2 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Winbond;W971GG6KB-25; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Broadcom;BCM53125; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = yes |ethoui = 3C:CE:73 |oui = 3C:CE:73
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2008.10-mpcore;; |stockos = Linux;2.6.31;;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 (Type A) |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.5 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 5-pin header,, unpopulated |jtag = yes,, 20-pin header,, unpopulated,, DJ2
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = power switch, external antennas, RSTP, SNMP, Jumbo Frame |addchip = 2A Bus Termination Regulator;Fitipower;FP6137E;;1;,,, Dual-Channel USB High-Side Power Switch;Fitipower;FP6862;;1;,,, 2A 18V 340kHz Synchronous Step-Down Converter;Richtek;RT7248;;2;,,, 3A 18V 340kHz Synchronous Step-Down Converter;Richtek;RT7270;;2; |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = cisco |defaultpass = cisco |defaultssid = ciscosb1 |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = CyberTAN |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = EoL |eoldate = 08/31/2022 |fccapprovdate = 09/27/2013 |estreldate = 06/2014 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = 9SIAPBUBHR3861 |asin = B01ID08VUO |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43217; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = soldered |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Cavium]]'' CNS3410 ARM11MPCore (@600MHz) *Memory: 128MB (SDRAM) DDR2 *Storage: 32MB Parallel NOR Flash *Network: 5x Gigabit Ethernet ports *WiFi: [[Broadcom]] BCM43217 (2T2R 802.11bgn) *USB: 1x USB 2.0 host port *Power: 12V, 2A via barrel
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery> File:Cisco RV130W Top.jpeg|Board Top File:Cisco RV130W Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
